why_this_matters: Tax law contains mathematical patterns and linguistic loopholes designed for those who understand the code. Frequency analysis reveals hidden optimization strategies
scrape_method: IRC analysis + tax court decisions + CPA strategy guides + business entity law + depreciation schedules + international tax treaties
raw_data_snippet: Section 179: Immediate expensing vs depreciation. 1031 exchanges: Like-kind property deferral. Cost segregation: Accelerated depreciation through reclassification. Entity election: LLC tax treatment flexibility
replication_instruction: Map tax code patterns for optimization opportunities, understand entity election strategies, apply cost segregation for accelerated depreciation, utilize exchange mechanisms for tax deferral
